title: Sampler, ca. 1930
medium:
Medium: cotton embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, back, and running stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Blue embroidery on cotton foundation by more than one hand.  Scattered floral, bird, fish bands, and other assorted motifs.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, ca. 1930.
ca. 1930. Medium: cotton embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, back, and running stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-20.
